sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; const RecruitForm = ({ match }) => { const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm(); const onSubmit = data => console.log(data); console.log(errors); const textInput = "my-4 w-2/3 mx-auto rounded-lg text-2xl" return (
